title: FF Meta Serif
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140904230113/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Typefaces](http://web.archive.org/web/20140904230113/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typefaces) : FF Meta Serif**

FF Meta Serif was recognized as [one of its Favorite Typefaces of 2007](http://web.archive.org/web/20140904230113/http:/typographica.org/001135.php) by the type blog [Typographica](http://web.archive.org/web/20140904230113/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typographica).

**FontShop Press:**  
 [FontFont Focus: FF Meta Serif Microsite](http://web.archive.org/web/20140904230113/http:/www.metaserif.com/)  
 [FontShop Newsletter: FF Meta Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20140904230113/http:/www.fontshop.com/features/newsletters/nov2007_a/)  
 [Unzipped: The Making of FF Meta Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20140904230113/http:/www.fontshop.be/details.php?entry=239)

**By its designers:**  
 [Erik Spiekermann](http://web.archive.org/web/20140904230113/http:/www.spiekermann.com/mten/2007/11/ff_meta_10.html)  
 [Christian Schwartz](http://web.archive.org/web/20140904230113/http:/christianschwartz.com/metaserif.shtml)  
 [Kris Sowersby](http://web.archive.org/web/20140904230113/http:/klim.co.nz/meta_serif.php)

**Discussion:**  
 [A Peek at Meta Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20140904230113/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37556)
author: paul d hunt
